target.name: help
target.echo:
Apache Harmony Ant Build
Usage:
ant fetch-depends Fetches all the common dependencies
ant clean Removes all the files fetched
ant properties Display the common properties that are use in the ant build files.

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes all the files generated by a build

target.name: check-depends
target.description: Report on whether the dependencies are met

target.name: fetch-depends
target.description: Fetches dependencies. Note: Some of Harmony's dependencies are licensed under terms other than the Apache License v2.

target.name: properties
target.description: Display the properties that are use in the ant build files
